mapper.select: SELECT M.NO ,M.NAME ,A.MEMBER_NO ,A.STATUS ,A.WORK_DAY ,A."START" ,A."END" ,A.WORK_TIME FROM MEMBER M , ATTENDANCE A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = M.NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE ( "NO", "MEMBER_NO", STATUS, WORK_DAY "START", "END", "WORK_TIME" ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTENDANCE_NO.NEXTVAL, 1, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 1 )
